tool_description: Translates diagnostic trouble codes into human-readable descriptions with technical details and common causes.

dtc_codes.description: Array of diagnostic trouble codes to look up

include_generic.description: Include generic OBD-II definitions when manufacturer-specific not available

error_messages: Invalid DTC format: Codes must follow standard format (P0XXX, B1XXX, C2XXX, U3XXX).
Unsupported vehicle: Vehicle make, model, or year not found in diagnostic database.
Code not found: One or more DTCs not recognized in generic or manufacturer databases.
Empty code list: At least one diagnostic trouble code must be provided.
usage: Provide array of DTC codes along with complete vehicle information. Tool returns detailed descriptions and potential causes for each code.

code_definitions.description: Detailed descriptions for each DTC code

common_causes.description: Most likely causes for each diagnostic code

affected_systems.description: Vehicle systems affected by each code

definition_source.description: Source of definition (manufacturer-specific or generic) for each code
